comments.body:
So something I would do (but it is not mandatory) is to add `-type` to everything.
- age_stamp could be `-type "int"`
- file_type could be `-type "str"`

We don't handle a list of paths yet, but it could be useful to run `Expand_Environment` on every path you consider to use, so people can take advantage of `%userprofile%` or `%public%`.

I would drop `-failifempty $false` because that's the default.

I would drop `-default $null` because that's the default.

I personally feel that only adding the non-default options is easier to see which options are e.g. required or have a default.

All of this we can do after this is merged, as I don't want delay merging any longer.
